entry.data:
PARTLY CLOUDY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 70S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HUMID WITH HIGHS IN THE MID 90S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
HUMID WITH LOWS IN THE UPPER 70S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HUMID WITH HIGHS IN THE LOWER 90S
WEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
HUMID WITH LOWS IN THE MID 70S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 90S

MOSTLY CLEAR
HOT
LOWS IN THE UPPER 70S
HIGHS IN THE MID 90S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 90S
